full_description: use the left arm to grasp the red block on the table, handover it to the right arm and place it on the blue pad.
preference: num of words should not exceed 15

template_example.visual_state_description: I can see red block on the table and a blue pad on the table. The red block is on the left and the blue pad is on the right.
template_example.reasoning_and_reflection: It's the beginning of the task. The assistant info provides the initial position to place temporarily for handover and the final position to place block. I will use them to handover the block and place the block to correct positions. The block is on the left side, so I will grasp it first with left arm. After placing it to the middle initial position, I will use right arm to grasp it and place it to the pad.
template_example.language_plan: I will use left arm to grasp the block first. And then lift it up to avoid collision with the other objects. After that, I will place it to middle initial position according to assistant info. After that, I will use right arm to grasp the block and raise it in case of collision with other objects, then place it to the rack.

parameters.z: ...(SOME FLOAT VALUE THROUGH YOUR OBSERVATION AND THINKING)...
